Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 010091 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 19 to allow the enlargement of an existing nursing home.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Enlargement of Nursing Home CD#19, Queens (010091ZSQ)

Items.Title: Application no. 20025236 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Luna Rossa Restaurant, LLC, d/b/a Cascina, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 647 Ninth Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20025236 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Luna Rossa Restaurant, LLC, d/b/a Cascina, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 647 Ninth Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
